column3: I tried {{c1::hard}} to remember her name, but I couldn't.
This coat is practically unused. I've {{c1::hardly}} worn it.
It's really dark in here. I can {{c1::hardly}} see.
Laura is a good tennis player. She hits the ball {{c1::hard}}.
Ben is going to run a marathon. He's been training {{c1::hard}}.
Gary looks just like he looked 15 years ago. He's {{c1::hardly}} changed.
